Header: Min. Maddumabandara speaks at event to lay foundation for drivers’ testing track(VIDEO)
Content: Minister of Internal Transport Ranjith Maddumabandara says that rules should be set up to mitigate road accidents. The minister made this statement while participating at a function in Werahera on Thursday. The function was held to lay the foundation for a drivers’ testing track at the Motor Vehicle Department’s office at Werahera.
